name: WoW Name Generator
description: Struggling to find the perfect name for your World of Warcraft character? Fear not, adventurer! Our WoW Name Generator is here to forge legendary monikers worthy of Azeroth.
introduction: Embark on your epic journey with a name that resonates with power, mystique, or maybe just a touch of silliness. Whether you're a noble Paladin, a cunning Rogue, or a fearsome Warlock, a great name is the first step to becoming a legend. Let's craft yours!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button and behold the magic!
Don't like what you see? Click it again! We've got an endless supply of names just waiting to be discovered.
Feeling creative? Mix and match prefixes and suffixes to create a truly unique name.
Once you've found the perfect name, copy it and proudly paste it into the character creation screen. Now go forth and conquer Azeroth!

faqs.question: Is this generator only for World of Warcraft?
faqs.answer: While primarily designed for WoW, feel free to use these names for any fantasy game, story, or even your pet hamster! The possibilities are endless.

faqs.question: Are the generated names lore-friendly?
faqs.answer: We've tried to incorporate elements that fit within the WoW universe, but ultimately, it's about finding a name that *you* love. Don't be afraid to get creative!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: The generated names are free for personal use. For commercial use, please check the specific terms of use for the individual words or names generated.

faqs.question: How many names can I generate?
faqs.answer: As many as your heart desires! We have an endless supply of prefixes and suffixes to create countless combinations.

faqs.question: My generated name is already taken! What do I do?
faqs.answer: Ah, the plight of every adventurer! Simply generate a new name. With so many possibilities, you're bound to find one that's both awesome and available.

faqs.question: Will this generator help me become a better WoW player?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee improved skills, having an epic name is definitely a step in the right direction! Confidence is key, adventurer!
